refreshContent() - 类 中的方法ui.view.GameMapView
This method refreshes the Content layer when it occurs some event on that, for example, add a new cell view, remove a cell view, or move a cell view, etc.
remove(Component) - 类 中的方法ui.view.View
This method overrides the remove() method in JPanel class
removeAllCells() - 类 中的方法ui.view.GameMapLayerView
This function is to clear the whole GameMapViewLayer in order to add new items on that
removeCell(Point) - 类 中的方法logic.GameMap
this method is to remove cell
removeCell(Point) - 类 中的方法ui.view.GameMapLayerView
This method is to remove a cell from GameMapView
removeMapName(int) - 类 中的方法logic.Campaign
this method is to remove the name of maps
RING - 类 中的静态变量logic.Equipment
 
rool(int) - 类 中的静态方法logic.Dice
This method is used to generate the dice result for once, only based on the dice.
rool(int, int) - 类 中的静态方法logic.Dice
This method is used to generate the dice result for once, based on the dice and also the dice modifier.
rool(int, int, int) - 类 中的静态方法logic.Dice
This method is used to generate the dice result for several times.
